xml_samples.xml_mapping: <hibernate-mapping xmlns="urn:nhibernate-mapping-2.0" > <class name="Castle.ActiveRecord.Tests.Model.Order, Castle.ActiveRecord.Tests" table="`Order`" > <id name="ID" type="Int32" column="OrderID" unsaved-value="0" > <generator class="native"> </generator> </id> <property name="OrderedDate" type="DateTime" column="OrderedDate" > </property> <property name="IsShipped" type="Boolean" column="IsShipped" > </property> <set name="Products" table="line_item" > <key column="order_id"/> <many-to-many class="Castle.ActiveRecord.Tests.Model.Product, Castle.ActiveRecord.Tests, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" column="product_id" /> </set> </class> </hibernate-mapping>

<hibernate-mapping xmlns="urn:nhibernate-mapping-2.0" > <class name="Castle.ActiveRecord.Tests.Model.OrderWithIDBag, Castle.ActiveRecord.Tests" table="`Order`" > <id name="ID" type="Int32" column="OrderID" unsaved-value="0" > <generator class="native"> </generator> </id> <property name="OrderedDate" type="DateTime" column="OrderedDate" > </property> <property name="IsShipped" type="Boolean" column="IsShipped" > </property> <idbag name="Products" table="line_item_non_ident" > <collection-id column="line_number" type="Int32" > <generator class="hilo"> <param name="table">testing_hilo</param> <param name="column">sequence</param> <param name="max_lo">150</param> </generator> </collection-id> <key column="order_id"/> <many-to-many class="Castle.ActiveRecord.Tests.Model.ProductWithIDBag, Castle.ActiveRecord.Tests, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" column="product_id" /> </idbag> </class> </hibernate-mapping>
